body.name: Furniwell Office Chair Armless Cute Desk Chair Modern Adjustable Swivel Padded Fabric Vanity Task Computer Chair Home Office Desk Chairs with Wheels (Pink)
features: 【Comfortable Padded Seat】Seat cushion and backrest filled with high-density sponge, combined with ergonomic structure, will bring you a more comfortable sitting feeling and are not easy to deform, which is more suitable for people who need to sit for a long time.

【Simple Fashion】Unlike traditional office chairs, this armless office desk chair features a modern striped design and skin-friendly fabric, giving the space more energy and character. This wide office chair is perfect for a home office, living room, bedroom, vanity room, study, etc.
【Save Space】Ergonomic armless design can create more space for you and can be easily pushed to the bottom of the table when not in use. No armrests, better space saving.
【360° Swivel】The seat of this office chair can rotate 360 degrees, making the workspace more convenient. With a simple rotation, you can easily adjust any working angle.
【Height Adjustable】The height of the cute desk chair is adjustable and can be matched with different heights of the tables. The adjustable height range: 17.72-21.26 inch.

【Double Sturdy】The fabric task computer chair uses an SGS certified gas spring and a sturdy five-point chrome base. 360° swivel casters which are non-slip and scratch-resistant ensure the vanity chair's smooth and quiet movement.

【Customer Satisfaction Guarantee】We always try to offer the best to our customers. You can easily install this home office chair on your own within 30 minutes. If you meet any questions about it, please contact our service team. They are professional and patient. Your questions will be solved soon with their help.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Armless Desk Chair The cute chair for vanity desk, study and office With elastic backrest and comfy cushion, our home office chair with wheels will provide you with enough support. Whether you're providing seating for guests, meeting with colleagues, or doing paperwork, our office desk chair is an excellent choice.

Ergonomic Design Comfy Padded Seat and Backrest The design will bring you a more comfortable sitting feeling 360° Swivel and Height Adjustable You can rely on this comfortable seat for all your self-customizing needs

Why choose our chair Looking For A Modern Chair? Need a chair for makeup? For a home office? For studying? Or for a small spaced area? - Furniwell armless office chair functioning is versatile, so it can meet all your requirements.The Chair Can Be Adjustable? - Yes, this adjustable chair meets people's requirements of different gender, age and measurements, customizing its height!Need A Movable Office Chair? - With its nylon casters, this chair moves 360°smoothly and quietly. In addition, it is very friendly to hardwood floors, carpets and other mats. It is non-slip.

Specification Color Pink Material Fabric, Metal Chair Dimension 17.72 (D) x 18.5 (W) x 34.26 (H) Inches Seat Dimension 17.72 (D) x 18.5 (W) x 13 (H) Inches Seat Depth 3.15 Inches Height (from seat to floor) 17.72-21.26 Inches Maximum Loading Capacity 250 Pounds

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Received product on 1/22/24 even though it stated it was delivered on 1/18/24. After communicating with the seller and Fed Ex I finally received the product. Assembly was easy, assembling the seat can be a little tricky if doing it alone due to having to keep the holes aligned and screwing in the screws. Thanks to my daughter I didn’t have to do it alone. Very cute, comfortable and sturdy. Good size for my size 10 butt too! Lol I was gonna be so upset if it wasn’t delivered, but I am soooo glad that it arrived and I love it!! I’ll be buying another two for my daughters. Thank you! ;-)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 5, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Ok so I ordered two of these to match with my Roomate and we are OBSESSED! We got the grayish white color and it fits very well with whites and beige colors. The quality is very impressive and I love that the chair is not only on wheels but is also adjustable. The chair itself is very soft and squishy, and the back of it is low but high enough where you can easily sit back comfortably. Size wise it looked wider in the pictures but in reality the sitting part is about the same size as a regular chair if not slightly smaller. It’s also not a very tall chair which is perfect for desks and the adjustability helps with fitting it to your height needs. In terms of assembly it was very easy to put together and screw it all in. The package came with an Allen wrench and all the necessary screws and the directions were super easy to understand! I was hesitant at first because of a lack of reviews but this product is honestly really nice, especially for the price!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars No tools needed to build. Comes with everything you need!!!!
reviews.reviewText: so cute and comfy! Just like the picture.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Very nice But had a hard time building it
reviews.reviewText: it is very nice, and comfortable, only problem is i had a hard time assembling the seat together, it was very difficult to put together but overall, it is a very nice chair!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This is a very affordable comfortable chair that was simple to assemble and shipping was very quick.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Looks exactly like pic, great size
reviews.reviewText: Big enough for me to cross my legs, I’m 5’4 160lbs so not the smallest. Very comfortable. My cats like it too!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Such a cute chair
reviews.reviewText: I thought when i bough this chair it was going to be too short for my desk but you can adjust it and it goes really high. I love it i got the grey/white one and its SOOOO cute, so comfortable too. The back is low but not like extremely i feel like it makes it more comfortable. Im 120 pounds and i can cross my legs in this chair i love it for my vanity.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 29, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Needed a chair for my desk for a WFH job I start next month. Didn’t need something extravagant and this works perfect! Was simple and easy to put together. Only time I needed my boyfriends help was when I did the bottom and back screwing then together, would highly recommend! Shipping was fast too!
